body_html: @soumith I don't really care if they're called torch.sparse_sum or torch.sparse.sum (although it does seem slightly nicer to put it in a submodule). My point is that it's not the right API for this kind of thing, and should get deprecated sooner or later.
body_text: @soumith I don't really care if they're called torch.sparse_sum or torch.sparse.sum (although it does seem slightly nicer to put it in a submodule). My point is that it's not the right API for this kind of thing, and should get deprecated sooner or later.
body: @soumith I don't really care if they're called `torch.sparse_sum` or `torch.sparse.sum` (although it does seem slightly nicer to put it in a submodule). My point is that it's not the right API for this kind of thing, and should get deprecated sooner or later.
